name: Mesoamerican Music
description: Diverse styles and genres developed by the Indigenous peoples of Mesoamerica, a cultural region extending from central and southern Mexico through parts of Central America.

children.name: Nahua Music
children.description: Musical traditions of the Nahuas, a major grouping of indigenous peoples inhabiting various regions in Mesoamerica, most notably Mexico.

children.name: Pirekua
children.description: Traditional style of the P’urhépecha people, typically slow and in 3/8 or 6/8 time.
